body:
I!!!! just got a warning for swearing and i didnt i said wth and i got a warning i dont see the point so if you could put that infraction off my list that would be great because i didnt even swear and i am really sad so yea thanks.

Mrme2298 :')

title: Infractions

replies.body:
You were swearing, and the staff member who dealt the punishment was correct. 

Breaking the rules will cause unwanted infractions.
replies.body_tagged:
You were swearing, and the staff member who dealt the punishment was correct. 

Breaking the rules will cause unwanted infractions.

replies.body: You making spammy threads on the forums doesn't make me side with you, so I don't really care wether you're going to pretend you didn't swear or not, it doesn't make a difference.
replies.body_tagged: You making spammy threads on the forums doesn't make me side with you, so I don't really care wether you're going to pretend you didn't swear or not, it doesn't make a difference.

replies.body: If you're not pleased with your infraction, you can email support@avicus.net to try to appeal it.
replies.body_tagged: If you're not pleased with your infraction, you can email support@avicus.net to try to appeal it.

replies.body: A warning isn't really a big deal. It's a small infraction and will hardly affect anything. You can email support@avicus.net with an appeal to attempt to remove it.
replies.body_tagged: A warning isn't really a big deal. It's a small infraction and will hardly affect anything. You can email support@avicus.net with an appeal to attempt to remove it.
